          <title>
            <string language="en">Storing energy from wind in a battery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Speicherung von von Energie vom Wind in einer 
Batterie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enregistrer l'énergie du vent dans une batterie</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how energy from the wind is converted and stored in a battery.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment de l'énergie du

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como a energia do vento é

          </description>
